name: Blue Square and Yellow Circle
description:
This short puzzle game can be played either as 2 players or as a single player. This game originally is made for a Uni project under 3 weeks.

Controls :
WASD and Arrow Keys
Press "R" to reset
Press "ESC" to quit the game

Let me know what you think about the game: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScR6z3KfKiTpcE2uZkeUONUKyEBD0SRIqDagf1r...
